DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study was about survey of prevalence of fungal infections among drug users referring to methadone wards of Hospitals in northeast region of Iran
DOC.brief_title: Superficial and Cutaneous Fungal Infections Among Drug-users in Northeast Region of Iran
DOC.detailed_description: There were two groups with overall members of 1436. Statistically, the investigators have used "Likelihood ratio " and " Exact's Fisher" tests.
DOC.criteria: Suspected fungal lesions non use of local or edible antifungal drugs and not taking bath within the last 48 hours of testing
